Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Commandant!'}
{3: 'A light tap on your shoulder makes you turn around quickly, and you see a familiar face.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Liv is holding a bouquet of pale pink roses that match her hair, merging perfectly with the early morning light.'}
{2: 'These flowers look absolutely gorgeous.', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I passed by a flower shop on my way and decided to pick up a few.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh, that reminds me...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv opens her portable terminal and brings up a poster.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "There's a flower show going on at the nearby park—if we take the cable car, we'll arrive in no time... Then it's just a short walk to the dessert street...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pores over the notes on her terminal with a determined look, clearly ready for today.'}
{2: "If that's what you want to do...", 3: '18', 4: "I'm totally on board.", 5: '19'}
{2: 'Count me in, too.', 3: '19'}
{3: 'Liv nods, and you head off together toward the platform at an easy pace.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory327.png'}
{3: 'A sharp jingle rings out as two coin-textured tickets drop from the ticket machine.'}
{2: 'They give off such a nostalgic vibe.', 3: '27', 4: "They're so intriguing.", 5: '29'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I've only seen them in books.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "They look like they're from the Golden Age...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv and you board the suspended train and sit facing each other at a small table. She props her bouquet by the window.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1014.jpg'}
{3: "The cabin is cramped, with room for maybe five or six people at most. At this time of day, though, it's just the two of you—no other passengers in sight."}
{3: 'Before long, the cable car sets off at a relaxed, strolling pace, gently pulling away from the station.'}
{3: 'Your eyes adjust to the sudden morning light, and the vibrant panorama of Constellia spreads out before you.'}
{3: "You and Liv are both looking out the window. Between the buildings, the skyscrapers' floor-to-ceiling windows shimmer, reflecting light like gentle waves on water."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's nothing like what you see from the transport craft.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv leans against the window, and in her reflection, you catch not just curiosity but a hint of daydreaming in her eyes.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Now it actually feels like we're truly entering this city.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Those windmills, so close they seem within reach, are spinning quietly. Right now, they really do feel just an arm's length away."}
{3: 'The cable car slowly glides past the rows of buildings, heading over a wide expanse of lake.'}
{3: 'Gazing down, a few boats drift across the water while vehicles cross the bridge spanning the lake, their horns echoing faintly in the distance.'}
{3: 'Right now, all that commotion feels tucked away, separated by this little cabin.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'To those in the Golden Age, this must seem like just another ordinary city scene, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv shares her thoughts.'}
{2: 'Perhaps so.', 3: '60', 4: 'They sure were lucky.', 5: '60'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's absolutely beautiful...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I wish we could live like this all the time...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'The buildings ahead grow smaller, and a graffiti-splashed neighborhood appears. When you look up, you can see undeveloped mountains rising through the faint clouds in the distance.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Look, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A flock of bright blue-winged birds is flying past.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "It's as if they're influencing everything around. All at once, the cable car lurches, and the machinery lets out a piercing squeak."}
{3: 'The cabin jerks to a stop and sways briefly before easing back into balance.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv carefully steadies herself while moving closer to you. She gently holds your arm, but the rocking doesn't let up."}
{3: 'What was supposed to be a soft, reassuring birdsong now makes the atmosphere even more tense.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Sh-should we call for help?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I think it's probably nothing serious...", 3: '90', 4: "It doesn't look like there's any malfunction.", 5: '90'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Okay, if we need to, I'll call for backup right away!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The birds circle the cable car, their chirping echoing all around. After one pass, they fly off again to someplace farther away.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{3: 'They gradually disappear in the warm sunlight.'}
{3: 'The cabin is getting steadier as it moves forward, and the danger you initially worry about never happens.'}
{2: 'Phew...', 3: '99', 4: 'Holding up just fine...', 5: '99'}
{3: 'Liv and you both let out a long sigh of relief at the same time.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Liv has a serious look on her face as she observes the cabin ropes, and after a moment, she finally relaxes.'}
{3: "That's when you notice this gentle pressure on your arm."}
{3: "Liv is still clinging to your arm like she's forgotten to let go."}
{3: "Her silence doesn't mean she's ignoring the situation; the young girl beside you simply eases her grip."}
{3: 'Even with Liv lowering her head, you can still spot that subtle blush creeping onto her cheeks.'}
{3: "You're in the latter half of your journey now, and the finish line is visibly close."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'C-can we just stay like this...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv pretends to look out the window as she blurts these words out.'}
